doctor.info: Dr. M. A. Alim is a Urologist in Sylhet. His qualification is MBBS, MS (Urology), Higher Training in Urology (USA, Germany, India & Pakistan). He is a Assistant Professor & Head, Urology at Sylhet MAG Osmani Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Medical Center & Hospital, Sylhet. Practicing hour of Dr. M. A. Alim at Popular Medical Center & Hospital, Sylhet is 5.30pm to 9pm (Closed: Thu & Friday).
